predicate.note: Frames file for 'accumulate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'amass'.

roleset.name: amass

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Pennzoil is rumored *trace* to be accumulating a stake in Chevron in order to push for a revamping of the company.
example.arg: in order to push for a revamping of the company

example.name: perhaps with price
example.text: John accumulated a gigantic pile of old tires for a dollar each.
example.arg: a gigantic pile of old tires

roleset.note: I kinda doubt price would actually be used, but just in case, there it is.
